thread.section_title: RVT.com Classifieds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RVT.com Classifieds | rvt.com
thread.title: John Wood
thread.title_full: RVT.com Classifieds reviewed by John Wood

author: John Wood
title: John Wood
text: We tried other options to sale our RV but none were as great as the responses we received on RVT.com. Even the cost of selling on RVT.com was more reasonable than our other options. Would HIGHLY recommend RVT.com to buyers and sellers. It was easy to set up our ad and had many responses within days. Again a BIG THANKS to RVT.com.
